meta.content:
Patrons of USD 340,
The Novel Coronavirus Covid-19 is spreading across the country. Information regarding the virus is changing on a daily basis. For the most up-to-date information please visit the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) at:
https://www.cdc.gov/ coronavirus/2019-ncov/index. html

div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 10:53 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. Windy, with a north wind 25 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Breezy, with a northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 73. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
